comments.body: Like `a <= 2 AND 2 <= a` where I would expect `a = 2` reduced result. `FilterReduction` can transforms it into `a <= 2 AND 2 = a`. Then `ConstantPropagation` (only the enhanced in https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/24553) can transform it into `2 <= 2 AND 2 = a` ...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@        EliminateSubqueryAliases) ::
        Batch("FilterReduction", FixedPoint(10),
          ConstantPropagation,
          FilterReduction,
          ConstantFolding,
